title: AsoPMR Team Building
content:
Last Friday, the AsoPMR team took a break to enjoy a #teambuilding day that combined laughter, challenges, and camaraderie ü§ù
We started the day with a great group breakfast, followed by a mysterious #escaperoom activity at Escape Hunt üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüîê, where we put our communication, logic, and teamwork skills to the test üß†(and we made it out just in time...! ‚è≥üòÖ)
Afterward, we wrapped up the experience with a meal full of anecdotes and good times, strengthening the bonds that make us a better team üçΩÔ∏è üë•
‚ú® These moments remind us that, beyond work, the most valuable asset is the human team behind each project.
#Teambuilding #Teamwork #AsoPMR

title: UOC - Final Project Area
content:
I have been assigned option 1 of my Bachelor's Thesis (TFG) area request for the Degree in Computer Engineering, which is the Mobile Application Development TFG area.
Furthermore, for my TFG at the UOC, I will be presenting my own Android app, doTHEWORKOUT, my workout app.
description: doTHEWORKOUT for Bachelor's Thesis at the UOC

title: UOC - Final Degree Project
content:
Exciting news! üéâ My doTHEWORKOUT app project has been approved as my Final Degree Project (TFG) at UOC (Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering).

In this video, I tell you all the details about how this app, which is already published on the Play Store (though very basic), becomes the pillar of my final university project. I'm at the starting point and share my initial planning for the semester.

If you're interested in seeing the behind-the-scenes of a real TFG, starting from scratch, and how a hobby is transformed into an academic project, hit play!
description: doTHEWORKOUT - Final Degree Project at UOC

title: Today, January 1st, 2026, I am launching the biggest project of my life
content:
Happy New Year and blessings to everyone! I hope 2026 is full of health and achieved goals. ‚ú®
Today, January 1st, 2026, I am launching the biggest project of my life. What started as a dream 5 years ago, even before starting university, became my Final Degree Project and today, it is finally my professional reality: doTHEWORKOUT. üöÄ
If your resolution for this year is to get in shape with real, granular, and professional tracking, this app is for you. No filters, no complications, and all my effort poured into it. Be one of the first to download it and see the result of this great journey! üëá
üì≤ Download it now on Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dothebest.workout
üåê More info at: www.dotheworkout.com / www.denxiik.com
What will you find inside?
‚úÖ 7 Routines available: From beginner programs (Easy Start, Beginner LADY/BRO/CALISTHENICS) and my personal routine, to intensive programs (Beginner BURN) or therapeutic ones (BackRelief).
‚úÖ Languages: Full availability in Spanish, English, and Ukrainian (and Romanian is almost ready!).
‚úÖ Exclusive to Android: On Google Play for now, but the iOS version is already on the way!
#HappyNewYear #2026 #doTHEWORKOUT #FitnessApp #AndroidDev #Entrepreneurship #TFG #DreamComeTrue #TheProjectOfMyLife
description: Happy New Year and blessings to everyone! I hope 2026 is full of health and achieved goals. ‚ú®
